org.xchain.framework.lifecycle

Class LifecycleContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.lifecycle.LifecycleContext

  • public class LifecycleContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The lifecycle context for the xchain framework. This class holds the class loader that is used to load commands, the configuration context, and a mapping of namespace uris to namespace contexts.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Mike Moulton, Devon Tackett
